knimeNode.name: Dictionary Extractor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a global dictionary over all documents.

fullDescription.intro: This node creates a global dictionary over all documents. Additionally, it creates three frequency columns: Term frequency, document frequency and inverse document frequency. It is possible to create a data table containing only the most frequent terms based on the selected frequency count. The node also provides an index column with numbers which can be used for replacing words with numbers while preprocessing documents for deep learning.
fullDescription.option: Select the document column to extract the document from.
Check, if the data table should be restricted on the top k most frequent terms.
If the 'Most frequent terms (k)' option is checked, select the frequency method used to filter the terms.
The number of threads used to process the documents.

ports.inPort: The input table containing the documents.
ports.outPort: An output table containing a dictionary column, frequency columns and an index column.
